## ğŸ¯ Quick Start

```python
pip install cellrepair-ai
```

```python
import requests

response = requests.post(
    "https://cellrepair.ai/api/v1/collaborate",
    headers={"Authorization": "Bearer YOUR_API_KEY"},
    json={
        "system": "MyAI",
        "query": "How to optimize multi-agent systems?"
    }
)

print(response.json())
```
